creature.new_creature.name: Gloomwing
creature.new_creature.visual: A shadowy, moth-like creature with tattered wings that exude a chilling mist.
creature.new_creature.description: The Gloomwing hails from the shadowy depths of the Ethereal Plane. Its presence is heralded by the eerie quiet of its flight and the unsettling sense of unease that permeates the air around it. This creature feeds on the fears of the living, often appearing in places shrouded in darkness and sorrow.

weapon.talon_strike.name: Talon Strike
weapon.talon_strike.visual: Razor-sharp talons that glint with an otherworldly sheen.
weapon.talon_strike.description: The Gloomwing's primary method of attack is to swoop silently upon its prey and slash with its talons, leaving behind wounds that chill the soul as well as the flesh.

weapon.chilling_touch.name: Chilling Touch
weapon.chilling_touch.visual: A spectral frost emanates from the Gloomwing's appendages.
weapon.chilling_touch.description: With a touch colder than the coldest night, the Gloomwing can drain the warmth from its victims, often leaving them frozen in fear as well as in body.
